TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_bzyok, title = bzyok, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/bzyok} }

S.FORM: == bzyok == qmayat bzyok hopa aga niqun ta la. mnoyas balay qu bzyok qnhyun hiya'. mutu wahan maniq na bzyok qnhyun qu bway na bgayaw. sapat mha ni sqliqun ta' 'laqi' kneril lga, mutu ta' msina' pira' bzyok galan ta' sapat.

== bzyok == qmayat bzyok hopa aga niqon ta la. mnoyas balay qo bzyok qnhyon hiya'. moto wahan maniq na bzyok qnhyon qo bway na bgayaw. sapat mha ni sqliqon ta' 'laqi' kneril lga, moto ta' msina' pira' bzyok galan ta' sapat.
